resp = client.indices.put_index_template(
    name="template_1",
    index_patterns=[
        "temp*"
    ],
    priority=0,
    template={
        "settings": {
            "number_of_shards": 1,
            "number_of_replicas": 0
        },
        "mappings": {
            "_source": {
                "enabled": False
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
